channel.title: rat-os/ratos
channel.description: An OS focusing on making klipper more approachable

item.title: RatOS v2.0.0 BETA 1 is now available!
item.description: We have now reached beta! Go to https://github.com/Rat-OS/RatOS/releases/tag/v2.0.0-beta1 to download the beta release and flash it to your Pi's SD card. You cannot upgrade from alpha to beta without reflashing.
